content.text:
# Darkness Revolution

is a professional wrestling stable mainly performing in the Japanese professional wrestling promotion Dream Star Fighting Marigold. The stable currently consists of Nagisa Nozaki, Misa Matsui, Chiaki and Rea Seto. It is the first-ever unit formed in Marigold.
History
Dark Wolf Army (July 2024–February 2025)
Nagisa Nozaki and Chiaki entered the tournament for the inaugural Marigold Twin Star Championship on July 21, 2024, under the tag name of "Dark Wolf Army" in which they defeated Rea Seto and Komomo Minami in the first rounds, then fell short to MiraiSaku (Mirai and Mai Sakurai) in the second rounds. Nozaki and Chiaki continued to tag up for the next months, making their debut in a pay-per-view on the first night of the Marigold Winter Wonderful Fight 2024 from November 14, where they defeated Selene Flora (Victoria Yuzuki and Kizuna Tanaka) in tag team competition. They won the Marigold Twin Star Championship on the second night of the same event from December 13, 2024, by defeating Mirai and Mai Sakurai. Nozaki and Chiaki dropped the titles three weeks later at Marigold First Dream 2025 on January 3 to Bozilla and Tank. On the first night of the Marigold New Year's Golden Garden 2025 from January 13, Nozaki and Chiaki defeated Mai Sakurai and Rea Seto in tag team competition.
Darkness Revolution (February 2025–present)
On February 14, 2025, Chiaki and Nagisa Nozaki wrestled the misfit team of Bozilla and Megaton into a draw. After the bout concluded, the two teams reconciled their differences that had come to a head in December 2024. They were then joined by Misa Matsui as they declared the formation of the stable under the name of "Darkness Revolution". The representants of the unit competed for the first time under the stable banner on the third night of the Marigold New Year's Golden Garden 2025 from February 20, where they defeated Chika Goto, Miku Aono and Natsumi Showzuki. At Marigold Spring Victory Series 2025 on March 30, Chiaki and Misa Matsui defeated Natsumi Showzuki and Chika Goto. At Marigold Shine Forever 2025 on May 24, Chiaki, Nagisa Nozaki, Misa Matsui and Megaton defeated Chanyota, Erina Yamanaka, Nagisa Tachibana and Ryoko Sakimura in eight-woman tag team competition. Rea Seto joined the stable on July 12, 2025. At Marigold Burning Desire 2025 on July 16, Nozaki, Chiaki, Matsui and Seto picked up a victory over  Mirai, Chanyota, Megaton and Yuuka Yamazaki. Matsui, Nozaki, Chiaki and Seto represented the stable in the Marigold Dream Star Grand Prix 2025, with all of them failing to qualify to the finals. At Marigold Grand Destiny 2025 on October 26, Matsui and Chiaki defeated Magenta (Riko Kawahata and Maria) to win the Marigold Twin Star Championship.
